intro: Agathosma rotundipetala, commonly known as the African geranium, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the family Asteraceae and is characterized by its small, clustered flowers and aromatic foliage. The plant typically grows in rocky, well-drained soils and thrives in full sun. Its leaves are often used in traditional medicine for their purported health benefits. Agathosma rotundipetala is also cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its attractive appearance and resilience.
